title: 2 dead, 2 injured in south Louisville shooting
content:
LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) – Two men are dead and two other people are injured following a shooting in south Louisville.
The shootings were reported inside an apartment the 2800 block of Rodman Street, near the intersection of M Street, around 10 p.m. Tuesday, according to Louisville Metro Police Department spokeswoman Alicia Smiley.
Two of the shooting victims were pronounced dead at the scene. Two relatives of the deceased victims said the men were ages 26 and 29. WAVE 3 News is not releasing their names until the coroner has confirmed their identity.
Two other victims, a man and a woman, were taken to University of Louisville Hospital for treatment. The condition of the hospitalized victims has not been released.
Smiley said officers believe the woman lived in the apartment.
Police have not released any suspect information.
The LMPD Homicide Unit is investigating. Anyone with information is asked to call the anonymous police tip line at (502) 574-LMPD.
